rules.fullName: Contact Marketo check for Customer Type
rules.description: contacts which have the 'Contact type' as Customer the Sync to Marketo checkbox should automatically/by default checked

Req #5119
Send Email notification (REMINDER) to contact owner if certain criteria's on contact are full filled
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Open"),(OR(ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, "0 - 99K"),ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, "100K - 249K"), ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, "250K - 499K"),ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, "500K - 1M"),ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, "Over 1M"),ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, "Not specified"))), NOT(ISBLANK(Description)), (OR(ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Timeframe__c , "0 - 3 Months"),ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Timeframe__c , "4 - 6 Months"),ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Timeframe__c , "7 - 12 Months"),ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Timeframe__c , "No Project Now"))) , (OR(ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Role__c, "Approver"),ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Role__c, "Decision Maker"),ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Role__c, "Influencer"),ISPICKVAL(Purchasing_Role__c, "Contact"))), $Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, NOT(ISBLANK(Marketing_Campaign__c )))

rules.description: This workflow is used to update the flag Sync To Marketo as True if the contact type is a customer
